name: Fred's Fantastic Fruit Factory
description:
Welcome to Fred's Fruit Factory, where you can follow your dreams of being a fruit sorter. Sort the six kinds of fruit into the right bins, but don't let any go in the trash.

Link to Liliuo.io- https://liluo.io/clearknight/freds-fantastic-fruit-factory

Credits

- Music is from the GDevelop asset store

- Sound effects made with JSFXR
